Articles.Content: hey i played this game a few months ago i downloaded it then i forgot about it and now i found it again when i was deleting some programs on my pc... i am not gonna write many topics or reply to many i am just gonna look around and read what you guys is writing and maybe i will buy the game soon instead of playing the demo
